info.headline: Baoding Meteorological Observatory updates lightning yellow warning [Level III/Heavy]
info.description: At 21:29 on July 12, 2024, Baoding Meteorological Observatory continued to issue a yellow warning signal for lightning: it is expected that all counties and districts in Baoding will still have thunderstorms from tonight to tomorrow morning. Thunderstorms will be accompanied by short-term heavy rainfall, short-term strong winds and other strong convective weather. Please pay attention to prevention.
info.instruction: 1. The government and relevant departments shall carry out lightning protection work in accordance with their responsibilities; 2. Pay close attention to the weather and try to avoid outdoor activities as much as possible.

info.headline: 保定市气象台更新雷电黄色预警[Ⅲ级/较重]
info.description: 保定市气象台2024年07月12日21时29分继续发布雷电黄色预警信号：预计今天夜间到明天早晨，保定市全部县区仍有雷阵雨天气，雷雨时局地伴有短时强降水、短时大风等强对流天气，请注意防范。
info.instruction: 1.政府及相关部门按照职责做好防雷工作； 2.密切关注天气，尽量避免户外活动。
